'''Rachel Jessica Te Ao Maarama House''' is a {{Wikipedia|New Zealand}} actress and director, known for her roles in films by {{Wikipedia|Taika Waititi}}.

== In the ''Minecraft'' franchise ==
In 2025, House voiced {{AMCM|Malgosha}}, the main antagonist of {{AMCM}}.<ref>{{Citation|url=https://www.ign.com/articles/a-minecraft-movie-trailer-takes-viewers-to-the-nether-to-reveal-new-story-details-and-loads-of-easter-eggs|title=A Minecraft Movie Trailer Takes Viewers to the Nether to Reveal New Story Details and Loads of Easter Eggs|author=Michael Cripe|website=IGN|date=February 27, 2025}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.gamespot.com/articles/new-minecraft-movie-trailer-reveals-its-villain-free-in-game-jetpack-coming-for-some-ticket-buyers/1100-6529760/|title=New Minecraft Movie Trailer Reveals Its Villain, Free In-Game Jetpack Coming For Some Ticket Buyers|author=Eddie Makuch|website=GameSpot|date=February 27, 2025}}</ref>

== Trivia ==
* Prior to appearing in ''[[Minecraft (franchise)|Minecraft]]'', a character House had voiced, [https://disney.fandom.com/wiki/Gramma_Tala Gramma Tala] from ''[[Moana]]'', appeared as a skin in the [[Moana Character Pack]] and [[Moana 2]].
